title: Nyx eSports Club looking for a coach for OOL
body:
Hey guys,
Nyx eSports Club is an up and coming league of legends team who's aim is to push through this splits OOL (Oceanic Open Ladder) and make it into OCS (Oceanic Challenger Series). We have just finished our trial process and have cemented a 5 man roster. Our roster is Diamond 1+ elo. We are currently in search of a coach who can handle players of this calibre and help bring the team to a new level of play.
If you feel that you would be a good fit for this team and meet the requirements below please add "Archfugle" in game or leave a comment below.

Requirements:
- Age 18+
- A vast knowledge of the game 
- Willingness to follow the meta closely as well as watching the competitive to try and recognise shifts in the meta as soon as possible
- Attend trainings and tournaments 4-5 times a week
- A good quality mic and TS3

Preferred:
- A ranking of platinum or higher
- Previous experience in coaching

replies.body:
Hey there. I was wondering if I could register as a sub, or potentially a player. I heard from another user that you could be potentially recruiting, and as our OOL org. (Hyperlight gaming) has disbanded both of teams I was wondering if it would be at all possible to join you. 
If not, I'm happy to try out as a coach, as I have enough game knowledge to fill you in on mistakes, adaptations and directions in gameplay. Though, I've never been a coach before, I've previously been a very verbal player in most of my past teams and since I usually play mid/jungle that makes me the primary shotcaller.

Anyhow, consider if you wish. Just feel free include me if you want. Thank you for your time.

Hey I'd love to talk to you about coming on board. I have got a lot of experience with gaming coaching and would love to help your team get to the next level. 
I've achieved heights such as ...

1st Australian ranked player in a console game. 

Top 10 teams in AUs in halo 3

Top 5 ranked players in StarCraft 2 ( at one point)

Top 5 ranked guilds wow for AU's in WOD ( kept ranking for about 5 months) ..


And topped pretty much every game in other areas too! 

So hit me up on Lol. - trissy or email tristankilpatrick123@hotmail.com

Thankyou.
I can teach you how to play if you want.
